DOC.criteria: Birth weight ≤1500 g AND/OR gestational age ≤32 week ( determined maternal date , fetal ultrasound , Dubowitz/Ballard examination combination thereof ) Male female Tolerating enteral intake human milk , donor milk combination ≥100 mL/kg/d ≥ 24 h Subject anticipate receive human milk , donor milk combination ≥ 3 consecutive week achieve full fortification volume intake contain 150 180 mL/kg/d . Infants current systemic disease Infants history systemic disease Any congenital anomaly GI tract significantly interfere nutrition growth previous GI surgery .
